agreement.title: User Agreement and Disclaimer
agreement.content:
Welcome to MOP (Messenger of Peace) service. Before using this service, please carefully read the following terms:

1. Service Description
This service is a private communication control system that provides secure and private communication functions.

2. User Responsibilities
(1) Users should properly keep account information and must not transfer, sell, or lend accounts to others.
(2) Users must not use this service to engage in illegal or irregular activities.
(3) Users should ensure the authenticity and accuracy of the information provided.

3. Privacy Protection
(1) We promise to protect user privacy and will not disclose user information without authorization.
(2) User data is only used to provide and improve services and will not be used for other commercial purposes.

4. Disclaimer
(1) Users shall bear any legal liability arising from violations of laws, regulations, or this agreement.
(2) We are not responsible for service interruptions or data loss caused by force majeure, network failures, etc.
(3) We are not responsible for any losses incurred by users due to the use of this service.

5. Agreement Modification
We reserve the right to modify this agreement at any time. The modified agreement will be published on the platform. Continued use of the service is deemed acceptance of the modified agreement.

6. Others
(1) We reserve the final right to interpret this agreement.
(2) If disputes arise between the parties, they should be resolved through friendly consultation; if consultation fails, they may file a lawsuit with the people's court with jurisdiction.

Please read and fully understand the above terms before using the service. Clicking "I have read and agree" means you have fully understood and agreed to accept all the contents of this agreement.
agreement.checkbox_label: I have read and agree to the User Agreement and Disclaimer
